### Summary

The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for laboratory services to process bulk sediment and rock samples to recover the mid-density and heavy-density mineral fractions and determine the abundance of indicator minerals. The Standing Offer (SO) period will be for one year, with four optional extensions of twelve months each.

### Key Requirements

* Provide laboratory services to process bulk sediment and rock samples
* Recover mid-density and heavy-density mineral fractions from samples
* Determine the abundance of indicator minerals in the recovered fractions

### Eligibility and Selection Criteria

* Availability of experienced personnel with expertise in laboratory services
* Capability to deliver laboratory services as required
* Technical and commercial capabilities to fulfill the requirements of the contract

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to offerors in accordance with the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other relevant trade agreements.
